short.ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,hi,h: TwExtract is a Chrome extension for Twitter that allows you to export & download tweets from any account into a CSV file.
short.am,de,es,es_419,et,fa,fi,fil,fr,gu,he,it: TwExtract is a Chrome extension designed for Twitter that enables you to export and download tweets from any account into a CSVâ€¦
short.da,el: One click to export tweet list of any X/Twitter account, save as CSV file.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,et,fa,fi,fil,:
TwExtract - Export Tweets allows you to quickly extract and export tweets from any account as a CSV file with one click. 

ğŸ† Advantage
Our extension can export more data, as we comply with Twitter's rate limits.

ğŸ‘¨ğŸ»â€ğŸ’» Features
âœ“ Extract and export tweets from a user to CSV
âœ“ Extract and export tweets from a user to CSV within a selected date range
âœ“ Automatically managing Twitter's rate limits

ğŸŸ¢ indicates the normal time interval for requests
ğŸŸ  indicates the cooldown period's time interval
ğŸ”´ indicates the time interval for request errors

ğŸ—‚ï¸ What You Get?
- ID
- Text
- Tweet URL
- Language
- Type
- Author Name
- Author Username
- View Count
- Bookmark Count
- Favorite Count
- Retweet Count
- Reply Count
- Quote Count
- Created At
- Source
- Hashtags
- URLs
- Media Type
- Media URLs

ğŸ“ƒ How to Start Exporting?
- Enter the Twitter username or open the extension on the Twitter userâ€™s profile, and the extension will automatically fill in the username.
- Click the Start Exporting Button.

â“FAQ
How Can I Export All the Tweets From a Specific User?
- By default, if the date option is not selected, all of the user's tweets will be exported. In theory, this extension can export all of a user's tweets, but when exporting a large amount of data, it may trigger Twitter's limits, causing the export to be interrupted. If this happens, you can use the date option to resume exporting tweets from where the last export was interrupted.

âš ï¸ Caution
To avoid being flagged by Twitter's risk control for frequent data exports, we suggest creating a dedicated Twitter account for exporting data.

ğŸ“¬ Contact
If you have any questions or suggestions to improve the extension, please feel free to contact us at jfl913@gmail.com.

ğŸ“ƒ Terms
Each time, you are entitled to export up to 150 data entries for free. To export more, you need to upgrade to Pro.

ğŸ”’ Data Privacy
All the data you process stays on your local computer and never goes through our servers.

â„¹ï¸ Disclaimer
Twitter is a trademark of Twitter, LLC. TwExtract - Export Tweets is not affiliated with, endorsed, sponsored, or otherwise related to Twitter, Inc. or any of its affiliates or subsidiaries.
